metadata.Title: CVE-2018-6871 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high.
metadata.Description:
LibreOffice before 5.4.5 and 6.x before 6.0.1 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via =WEBSERVICE calls in a document, which use the COM.MICROSOFT.WEBSERVICE function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-6871` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libreoffice-mysql-connector - 1:4.2.8-0ubuntu5.3
No subscription required

libreoffice-wiki-publisher - 1:4.2.8-0ubuntu5.3
No subscription required
